name: Markdown to Mind Map
description: Converts Markdown content into an interactive Markmap mind map HTML file, optionally opening the result in the browser. Supports export (PNG, JPG, SVG) and copying features.
author: @@official.shinkai

markdown.description: The markdown text to convert into a mindmap

open_in_browser.description: Whether to automatically open the resulting file in a browser ('yes' or 'no'). Defaults to yes.
